Funding the Deal

They always say, "If it's a deal, we'll get the money!"; then you find the deal and you can't seem to find anyone with the money! Learn the different ways to fund your deal.

Our expert panel will discuss the different types of lending available. They will present several deals and discuss what kind of funding is appropriate. Bring your questions!


Dave Conti – Residential Mortgages

Dave Conti, Loan Originator, has been working in the mortgage industry since

2003 and is the company owner of Vision Mortgage. David holds a Mortgage

Broker License in Massachusetts & New Hampshire along with a Loan Officer

License for each state.



Ann Bellamy – Hard Money

Ann Bellamy, owner of Buy Now Hard Money, has been investing in real

estate since 1997. As a hard money lender, Ann works with investors and

lenders in New Hampshire and Massachusetts Get a pre-approval letter to

present with your offer, understand when it makes sense to use hard money,

figure out how much you can borrow, present your deal to us properly so

it's likely to be funded.



Mark Dickey- Commercial

Mark Dickey is a Commercial Broker with Cale Commercial. He has been a

part of real estate for over 10 years and holds both his NH and MA Broker's

license. Mark specializes in multi-tenant & commercial with the focus on

advising investors both buying, selling and optimizing their investments.
